value:
The festival has everyone energized.
I can sense all their joy! It feels like
we're all smiling as one.$k$pSo this is what a summer festival is
like, huh?

Festivals are a time to forget our
troubles and leave our sadness
behind... If only for a brief moment.

This outfit is so foreign to me... I'm a
little nervous wearing it if I'm being
honest. I don't look odd in it, do I?

I used to be a fortune-teller, you
know. Would you like me to read
your fortune sometime?

I've never seen a dance such as this
Hoshidan one. It's so...mysterious to
me...$k$pI cannot help but feel that Sothe
would be much better at performing
it than I.

Oh, hello. I was just at the festival
where I saw your friend
$Nf.$k$pWill you be joining them soon?

I can sense all of our hearts
joining as one.

I feel like I've become a better
dancer.

Hmm... Perhaps there's still some
hesitation hidden in my heart...

I hope my dance is enough to
show my appreciation.

I'm Micaiah of the Dawn Brigade.
Thank you for inviting me to the
summer festival.$k$pHmm... I sense quite a bit of fun
waiting for me...

The time I've spent with everyone
here—laughing, dancing, singing...it
will live within my heart forever.$k$pThese memories will become my
beacon of hope. And I sense that
one day...$k$pthis same light will shine upon
everyone's future.$k$pEndless fighting can wear down our
hearts, and swelling stagnation can
lead us toward even greater calamity.$k$pHowever, the joy we feel today will
become a light that never fades. One
that drives the darkness away.$k$pI want to step into that light with the
people most precious to me...$k$pEach of us carrying this summer's
memories deep within our hearts.
それっ！
やっ！
ええっ！？
だめっ！
Let's dance!
For friendship!
A summer celebration!
Any dance, anytime!
Just need to rest my feet...
Mmmm...
This is a Hoshidan dance.
Don't give up!
Ohh, Yune, not again! Please, settle down!
Clothing from other lands is so often different from what I'm used to... Oh, I don't mean to say I don't like it!
You think this outfit looks good on me? Why, thank you.
This is just my first impression, but... this summer festival seems deeply spiritual to the people of Hoshido.
You'd like to see my dance? Well, I guess I have time to give you a quick look.
Got it.
Summer's here...
I'll dance!
